channel.title: Xline Reloaded (TESTERS)
channel.description:
[b]Ok the beta test is Tommarow or friday Most likely Friday[/b]
[b]say if anyone cant remmber xline old server here small vid from over 4 months ago![/b]
http://youtube.com/watch?v=LAYLXLZXC10
[b]Rules for Beta Test[/b] 1).Dont give out ip you will be ip-banned if you do 2).You must try and find bugs 3).And have Fun
[b]Xline Reloaded forums [/b] (not done yet) but heres url ( http://xlinereloaded.smfforfree3.com/index.php )
[b]To Become beta testers you must fill this out:[/b] 1). How old are you 2).name on forums/name on game 3).Will you find bugs in the game 4).Why should we pick you? 5). Will you donate to Xline reloaded, if so how much
[b]Beta Testers[/b]
[ul][li]-Legend-[/li] [li]Skulls=Teeez[/li] [li]planplan=kando2[/li] [li]cccrrraaazzziii [/li] [li]bloop[/li] [li]Pkity[/li] [li]Lummby_Ko [/li] [li]Senzafire[/li] [li]bubble1260[/li] [li]Lembypk[/li][/ul]
[size=20pt]Picture of client[/size]
[IMG]http://i168.photobucket.com/albums/u170/lostandfound92/lololol.jpg[/img]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img503.imageshack.us/img503/3173/laggtestlolce1.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/g.php?h=503&i=laggtestlolce1.png][IMG]http://img503.imageshack.us/img503/3173/laggtestlolce1.be62474306.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.title: Xline Reloaded (TESTERS)
item.dc:creator: @lostandfound lostandfound
item.description:
@lostandfound wrote:

[quote=“pkity, post:15, topic:135887”]1). How old are you-13
2).name on forums/name on game-pkity
3).Will you find bugs in the game-I’ll try…
4).Why should we pick you?-Idk cause i’m 1337 (sad i know)
5). Will you donate to Xline reloaded, if so how much-Probally not…[/quote]

ACCEPTED

[quote=“Aff, post:16, topic:135887”]1). How old are you - Bit Personal, but I’m twelve if you really have to know.
2).name on forums/name on game - Forums, Aff, Game, Ix Tim Xi
3).Will you find bugs in the game - Yes
4).Why should we pick you? - Because I know lots of bugs that occur in other servers, and your server may have them too, and if they do, I’ll be able to tell you so, so you can fix them.
5). Will you donate to Xline reloaded, if so how much - I can try…[/quote]

Declined

Read full topic

4).Why should we pick you? – Because i love to help people … and I love to play gameS!!!
5). Will you donate to Xline reloaded, if so how much – Yea… Ill help you if you need with coding … testing … all :)[/quote][quote=“cccrrraaazzziii, post:9, topic:135887”]How old are you: I’ll discuss that elsewhere .

Why should we pick you: You need testers, and all I can offer is my help .
Will you donate to Xline reloaded, if so how much: No certain amount, but if I can I will .[/quote]
